title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, admin, model manager) similar to ChatGPT interface.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines and generative tasks.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams answers from local Ollama models in chat channels.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async support and native JSON marshalling.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerators for streaming chat responses.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your notes using Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that forwards @ mentions to an Ollama model and streams back answers.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via REST with admin UI.
